name: Fball
overview: Fball is a turn-based American football game originally developed for the Commodore PET. Each turn the player must say what to do. There are thirteen actions in total, seven offensive and six defensive: Offensive actions: Run, Sweep, Screen pass, Long Pass, Punt, Field Goal, Timeout Defensive actions: Hold, Normal, Blitz, Intercept, Punt Return, Block Kick, Timeout The player can play against another player or against the computer. The field is shown on the screen as well as the yard line at which the ball is, but no players are visible. This game was published in Cursor #07 (1979/02) / PET Emulator
